Text:
damn! is this the real album? several of these tracks were on the last tree part album/ep "part six, parts 1,2,& 3" and the "apple tummy" album.
thanks though :)!

Yep, real album.
BUT! All the songs have been remixed and remastered, and they sound freakin GREAT!
Hey guys, if you like this music, please purchase a copy here:
http://www.indiemerchstore.com/mcchris/item/7957/
This is one of the few artists who deserves your support!
All the proceeds from his earnings go into the Cystic fibrosis fund, and helping his nephew Murray fight the disease!
Show mc the loooove!
i just saw mc chris bout 2 weeks ago in columbus, ohio. show was freakin awesome! i bought the goes to hell vinyl and had chris sign it. definitely a blast and one of the coolest people i've met.
MCC is the fuckin' man. Thanks for the post of this, whoever put it up. My band got to play a show with Chris last year, and it was the dopest shit all year and then some.
